name: A Night For Mischief
description:
It's a long night, and you are one bussy cat. 

In this incremental game, you take the role of a mischievous cat. Help it mess up the place and find the hidden objetcs! The more you mess it up, the more things you will discover!

It's just a fun little game, nothing more, we promise!

Thank you for checking out our game!

Made with love from Argentina.

Credits:

Programmer: Facundo Ferreira

Artist: Denise Chirich

Game Designer: Facundo Ferreira & Denishe Chirich

Music: Purple Planet
